title: Metal Skin Panic MADOX-01
synopsis: In the first test of a revolutionary personal battle-suit, the MADOX-01, Ace female test-pilot Elle Kusomoto smashes an attacking tank force and humiliates Lt. Kilgore, Japan's most-macho tank-jockey, in the process.
characters: ['Kusumoto, Ellie', '1st Lt. Kilgore', 'Sugimoto, Kouji', 'Nagura, Shiori', 'Onose, Haruo']
staff: [['Aramaki, Shinji', ['Director', ' Mechanical Design']], ['Anno, Hideaki', ['Key Animation']], ['Oomori, Takahiro', ['Key Animation']], ['Kishida, Takahiro', ['Key Animation']]]
